text: DDF may refer to: * Demographic Development Fund, Georgian think thank * Digestive Disorders Foundation, a British medical research charity * Digital distribution frame, a device which terminates digital data streams, allowing arbitrary interconnections to be made * 4,4'-Dinitro-3,3'-diazenofuroxan, an experimental high explosive * Disk Data Format, a structure describing how data is formatted across disks in a RAID group * Drop Dead Fred, a 1991 fantasy comedy film * Dubai Duty Free, a duty-free retailer * Sulfoxone, an anti-leprosy drug sold under “DDF” brand
title: DDF
